title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 120.17 - Notification and Reporting of Business Changes and Amendments for Applicants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 120.17 - Notification and Reporting of Business Changes and Amendments for Applicants

State Regulations
(a) An applicant
may update their application before it has been approved in a manner determined
by the Office. (b) If an applicant
is issued a license, the duty of ongoing disclosures for the licensee and its
true party of interests, pursuant to this Title, shall continue throughout the
licensed period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
120.17

Adopted

New

York State Register September 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
